verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* come \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* the \w key|strong="G2807"\w* of the bottomless \w pit|strong="G0012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w chain|strong="G0254"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he laid hold \w on|strong="G2902"\w* the \w dragon|strong="G1404"\w*, that \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w serpent|strong="G3789"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the bottomless \w pit|strong="G0012"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shut|strong="G2808"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G2808"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* set a \w seal|strong="G4972"\w* \w upon|strong="G1883"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w deceive|strong="G4105"\w* the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*, \w till|strong="G0891"\w* the \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* should be \w fulfilled|strong="G5055"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* must \w be|strong="G1163"\w* \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w* a \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w season|strong="G5550"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w thrones|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add I saw\add* the \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that were \w beheaded|strong="G3990"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w had|strong="G4352"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* had \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \add his\add* \w mark|strong="G5480"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w foreheads|strong="G3359"\w*, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w lived|strong="G2198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w reigned|strong="G0936"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w lived|strong="G0326"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w again|strong="G0326"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* were \w finished|strong="G5055"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \add is\add* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \add is\add* he that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*: \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w such|strong="G5130"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* they shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w reign|strong="G0936"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* the \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* are \w expired|strong="G5055"\w*, \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* shall be \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* shall go \w out|strong="G1831"\w* to \w deceive|strong="G4105"\w* the \w nations|strong="G1484"\w* which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w quarters|strong="G1137"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w Gog|strong="G1136"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Magog|strong="G3098"\w*, to \w gather|strong="G4863"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w together|strong="G4863"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w battle|strong="G4171"\w*: the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add is\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w sand|strong="G0285"\w* of the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w breadth|strong="G4114"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w compassed|strong="G2944"\w* the \w camp|strong="G3925"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w about|strong="G2944"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* came \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w devoured|strong="G2719"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w* that \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brimstone|strong="G2303"\w*, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* the \w beast|strong="G2342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the false \w prophet|strong="G5578"\w* \add are\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall be \w tormented|strong="G0928"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* fled \w away|strong="G5343"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w small|strong="G3398"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*, \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w books|strong="G0975"\w* were \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w book|strong="G0975"\w* was \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \add the book\add* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* were \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which were \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w books|strong="G0975"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* gave \w up|strong="G1325"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* which were \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hell|strong="G0086"\w* delivered \w up|strong="G1325"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* which were \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hell|strong="G0086"\w* were \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G5100"\w* \w was|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* was \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w lake|strong="G3041"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.
